column5: Hey Everyone,  Got out yesterday to do some pier fishing with my buddies. I recently tore the meniscus muscle in my knee so im very limited in my movements which made river fishing impossible, so i headed out west and grabbed my lawn chair, floating roe bags and relaxed...enjoy.  I got 4 in the day (only have 2 pics), all within the first hour we got there.... after that nothing..biggest was 9lbs 11 oz...    Brian with his only fish on the day   Nick with his first ever steelhead.   dobee
nice job....the fighting they put up out on the pier is always worth the boring wait !!!
